{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASRock |model=G10 |revision=(US) |asin=B01717UTXC, B01DUVQ6TY |newegg=N82E16833967011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |availability=now |price=200 |est_release_date=06/04/2015 |fcc_date=10/15/2015 |fcc_id=2AFEB-G10, 2AFEB-H2R |ic_id=20403-G10, 20403-H2R |pcb_id=1246-01000152-50Z |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Actions Microelectronics |cpu2_model=AM8251 |cpu2_cspeed=600 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4; |flags=MU-MIMO, HDMI, Miracast, IR remote, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASRock, ASRock_5G |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|ASRock G10 - Gaming AC2600 Wireless Router}} :[http://www.asrock.com/Networking/G10/ Product page] {{•}} [http://www.asrock.com/news/index.asp?id=2801 Press release] "1246-01000152-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2782095 FCC photos]. {{see also|ASRock H2R HDMI Dongle|ASRock X10R|Edimax}} ===Features=== *4T4R 802.11ac (1733Mbps) + 4T4R 802.11n (800Mbps) :Beamforming, Multi-User MIMO, [[IoT]] ([[Internet of Things]]) *Detachable 2-in-1 dongle - travel access point (AP) :or an HDMI dongle with 2T2R 802.11n Wi-Fi (Miracast) * HDMI Miracast / EZplay & DLNA (1920x1080 output resolution) :Works with devices: Android / iOS smartphones and tablets ===Specifications=== *Wi-Fi Technology: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (AC2600) *Data Rate: 802.11ac up to 1733Mbps, 802.11n up to 800Mbps *Antennas: 8x high performance internal dipole antennas :8x high power antennas that deliver wireless signals 360 degrees *Interface: 1x WAN GbE + 4x LAN GbE, Dual USB 3.0 ports, IR TX+RX *Key Features: Easy Setup, Adjustable Output Power, Parental Control, :Guest Wireless Network, Self-healing, Gaming Boost, Beamforming, :ASRock App, IR Learning Technology, Easy NAS, MU-MIMO, IPv6 *LAN: DHCP, PPPoE, Static IP, PPTP, L2TP *Power Adapter: DC 12V Power Input ===News=== *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/asrock-router-mu-mimo-g10-networking,29287.html ''ASRock G10'' on '''TomsHardware'''] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asrock-g10-router.27478/ ''ASRock G10'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===Reviews=== *[http://article.techlabs.by/51_35719.html ''ASRock G10 Router'' on '''TechLabs'''] :'''[[ASRock H2R HDMI Dongle]]''' (MFG OEM: [[Edimax]]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AFEB-H2R 2AFEB-H2R] (2015-10-13) ''HDMI 2-in-1 Router'' :*SoC: ''[[Actions Microelectronics]]'' AM8251 @600MHz MIPS :*Flash: 128MB ''Winbond'', RAM: 128MB ''Nanya'' :*WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192EU (2T2R 802.11bgn USB 2.0) :*LAN: [[Micrel]] ''(Mindray)'' KSZ8081MNX FE (10/100 PHY) __NOTOC__
